description: Anikka new to BDSM, and has no idea what she has signed up for. She knows she wants to learn more, so she petitioned to be trained. This training will be one of the most in depth sessions we have ever done. Every day she will be subjected to a minimum of two trainers per day, all bringing something different, but all for the same purpose. Her limits are tested mentally and physically with heavy impact, extreme electrical torment, and mind bending orgasms.
title: Training Anikka Albrite - Day 1
